MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Bennan Square and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm due to a fault on the underground network at 59 Bennan  Square and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:54pm on Sunday, 21 February 2021
